## RenderScheme.renderScene() method

Renders a scene by given camera

**Signature:**

```typescript
renderScene(scene: Scene, camera: Camera, compositor?: Compositor): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scene | [Scene](doc/markdown/./scene.scene.md) | The scene to be rendered |
|  camera | [Camera](doc/markdown/./scene.camera.md) | The camera that will be used to render the scene |
|  compositor | [Compositor](doc/markdown/./scene.compositor.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

void
